title: Schedule
description: Scheduling configuration for tasks (time-based or event-based).

timeBasedScheduling.description: Configuration for time-based schedules (RRULE or cron-like patterns).

schedule.description: One or more RFC-5545 RRULE strings or schedule expressions.

startDateTime.description: Optional scheduled start datetime in ISO 8601 format (UTC recommended).

timezone.description: Timezone identifier for the schedule (e.g., Etc/UTC).

version.description: Schedule version used for optimistic locking.
